meanings.definition: Not within the scope of a particular subject or topic.
meanings.sent1: The nonsubject information was not relevant to our discussion.
meanings.sent2: Her nonsubject comments were distracting from the main point.
meanings.sent3: The nonsubject details added a touch of randomness to the conversation.
meanings.sent4: The nonsubject elements painted a colorful backdrop to the main theme.
meanings.sent5: The nonsubject facts lingered on the edges of our focus.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is not the main focus or topic of discussion.
meanings.sent1: The nonsubject in the corner remained unnoticed throughout the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The book's nonsubject characters added depth to the story.
meanings.sent3: The nonsubject of the day turned out to be the unexpected hero.
meanings.sent4: She played the nonsubject role perfectly, blending into the background.
meanings.sent5: The nonsubject of the painting seemed to whisper a hidden story.
